short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply Tasks - ToDo List is a Chrome extension for easy task management. Intuitive interface, customize your to-do list & tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simply Tasks - ToDo List is a Chrome extension that lets you easily manage your tasks and to-do lists in a simple and intuitive interface. Effortlessly manage your daily tasks, customize your interface.
